abstract: Comcast and MGM said Tuesday they are teaming up to introduce a video-on-demand channel featuring action movies and TV shows.
snippet: Comcast and MGM said Tuesday they are teaming up to introduce a video-on-demand channel featuring action movies and TV shows.
lead_paragraph: “Comcast Corp. and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Inc. said Tuesday they are teaming up to introduce a video-on-demand channel featuring action movies and TV shows,” the Associated Press reports.

headline.main: Comcast, MGM to Launch Action Movie VOD Channel
